about_the_game:
Introduction

Datbyel's Nebula is a story-driven RPG game featuring light puzzles and turn-based battles.
It consists of two chapters, with Chapter 2 planned for development after the release of Chapter 1.

Synopsis

One day in September 1992...
After resigning from the major corporation Conek Energy, Ellie accidentally falls into the mysterious world of Datbyel.
In Datbyel, Ellie encounters Anchita, who has lost her memories, and together they embark on a journey to find a way back home.
Through this journey, Ellie may discover what she truly desires.

name: Datbyel's Nebula

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: After resigning from the major corporation Conek Energy, Ellie accidentally falls into the mysterious world of Datbyel. In Datbyel, Ellie solves puzzles, engages in battles, and converses, discovering more about herself and Anchita.
